name: postmanreadmegen
description: PostmanReadmeGen is a versatile tool that simplifies the process of generating informative README files for your GitHub repositories. It seamlessly integrates with Postman collections and includes a convenient pre-commit script to automate this task. With PostmanReadmeGen, you can efficiently document your API endpoints and ensure that your project's documentation stays up-to-date

scripts.prepare: npx husky install && npx husky add .husky/pre-commit

author: Siarhei Zavadski
